casebody.data:
BROOKS
v.
CAPSTAR CORPORATION. No. 110A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 3, 2005. John Morris, Michelle Sain Langdon, Roberta S. Sperry, Charlotte, for Capstar Corp., et al. Vernon Sumwalt, Bob Bollinger, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of October 2005."
